page.title: 03KNIGHTON HEATH GOLF CLUB
page.content: The Knighton Heath Golf Course is a large course of 180 acres and there are 684 members. The junior groups are twelve and over, and the senior group members twenty three and over. Each member has a share in the Club and when they leave they get this money back. They do not have to pay any additional fees for playing. If they wish they can hire equipment but very rarely do because they usually have their own. In 1984 the income of the Club was Â£120000 and they spent Â£110000. If a mew member wants to join they have to wait two months. There are 11 people in charge including the Head Green Keeper who has 3 full-time and 1 part-time people under his command. They cut the greens every other day. The Club opens at 7.30am and closes at 10.00pm.
